title: Women Super League : St . Noa and She Corporates shine
body_text:
St. Noa Girls Football Club delivered a dominant performance as they defeated Asubo Gafford Ladies 4-0 in a Finance Trust Bank Women Super League match held today at Kampala Quality Stadium in Kyebando. Docas Lwalisa, Patricia Nayiga, and Esther Babirye all scored, with St. Noaâ€™s relentless attack earning them three important points. In another match, She Corporates Women Football Club returned to winning ways with a 2-0 victory over Rines SS Women Football Club at the FUFA Technical Centre in Njeru. Sandra Kisakye and Rebecca Nakato were the goal scorers for She Corporates, who had dropped points in their previous matches against Kawempe Muslim and Makerere University Ladies.
